Package com.mygdx.game

Class Stock

java.lang.Object
com.mygdx.game.Stock
public class Stock extends Object
Holds the logic for simulating the stock market fluctuation.
Author:
Earl Castillo (ecastil3)

  • Constructor Details

    • Stock

      public Stock(String name, int price, String description, double mincg, double mincd, double maxcg, double maxcd, double divPay, int risk, int divRisk)
      Constructor for preset stocks.
      Parameters:
      name - Stock's name
      price - Stock's current buy price per quantity
      description - Description outlining the risks and reward of the stock.
      mincg - Minimum growth change.
      mincd - Minimum decline change.
      maxcg - Maximum growth change.
      maxcd - Maximum decline change
      divPay - Dividend payout percentage
      risk - Representation of the stock's risk.
      divRisk - Representation of the dividend's risk.

  • Method Details

    • dividendPay

      public int dividendPay()
      Returns the dividend payout per 5 rounds. Fractional values are rounded up
      Returns:
      Dividend payout per 5 rounds

    • getPrice

      public int getPrice()
      Returns the stock's current price
      Returns:
      Stock's current price

    • getDivPay

      public double getDivPay()
      Returns the dividend payout percentage
      Returns:
      Dividend payout percentage

    • getDescription

      public String getDescription()
      Returns the stock's description. Outlines the risks and reward of the stock.
      Returns:
      Description about the stock

    • getTickerName

      public String getTickerName()
      Returns the stock's ticker name.
      Returns:
      Stock ticker name

    • getPriceChange

      public double getPriceChange()
      Returns the percentage price change of the stock since last update. Capital gain or loss.
      Returns:
      Percentage price change of the stock since last update

    • getDivPayChange

      public double getDivPayChange()
      Returns the percentage dividend pay change since last update.
      Returns:
      Percentage dividend pay change since last update.

    • updatePrice

      public void updatePrice()
      Updates the stock price and dividend pay every round.

      The stock price and dividend pay are updated as follows:
      Stock Risk: Risk is determined from a number from 1 to 9, with 1 representing a 10% risk for stock to decline, up to a max risk of 9 having a 90% chance to decline.
      Dividend pay: divRisk 1 -> 10% chance to decrease divPay. 1% increase in divPay or 0.5% divPay decrease divRisk 3 -> 30% chance to decrease divPay. 10% incrase in divPay or 2% divPay decrease divRisk 5 -> 50% chance to decrease divPay. 30% increase in divPay or 50% divPay decrease
